label: Charleston Yearbook, 1922
description: A report from the mayor, city council, and various governmental departments of Charleston, S.C. for the year 1922.  The Year Book opens with an address from the mayor, John P. Grace, followed by reports from various departments.

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: A report from the mayor, city council, and various governmental departments of Charleston, S.C. for the year 1922.  The Year Book opens with an address from the mayor, John P. Grace, followed by reports from various departments.

metadata.label: Digitization Specifications
metadata.value: Scanned by the Lyrasis Digitization Project. 300 dpi. Archival masters are tiffs.

metadata.label: Collection Title
metadata.value: City Year Books for Charleston, South Carolina, 1880-1951
